Help.Description: Shows all types of Reaction Roles

Types:
`1` - React adds the Role, taking away the reaction removes the Role
`2` - Reacting adds the Role, taking away the reaction does not remove the Role
`3` - Reacting will remove the Role, taking away the reaction will not return the Role 
`4` - Reacting will remove the Role, taking away the reaction adds the Role 
`5` - Same concept as type 3 but removes the reaction
`6` - Reacting adds the Role and reacting removes the Role
